history.proof: intros Htryrecv. unfold Coh. split. - destruct Htryrecv as [Hvalid _]. apply Hvalid. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros W this filter f_valid_label s Htryrecv.

exceptions.exn: In environment W : world this : nid filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat) f_valid_label : forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \\in dom W s : state Htryrecv : tryrecv_act_safe s Unable to unify "true" with "valid s".

I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getS s lc)) (getLocal n (getS s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getS s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (getS s l)
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V) -> action W V this
skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getS s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, skip_safe W s -> coh p (getS s l)
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (getS s l)
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope

``` 
intros W this filter f_valid_label s Htryrecv.
unfold Coh.
split.
- destruct Htryrecv as [Hvalid _].
  apply Hvalid.
- split;[|split].
  + destruct Htryrecv as [_ [Hvalid _]].
    apply Hvalid.
  + destruct Htryrecv as [_ [_ [Hcomplete _]]].
    apply Hcomplete.
  + destruct Htryrecv as [_ [_ [_ Hdom]]].
    apply Hdom.
  + intros l.
    destruct Htryrecv as [_ [_ [_ [_ Hcoh]]].
    apply Hcoh.
```

original: intros W this filter f_valid_label s Htryrecv. unfold Coh. split. - destruct Htryrecv as [Hvalid _]. apply Hvalid. - split;[|split]. + destruct Htryrecv as [_ [Hvalid _]]. apply Hvalid. + destruct Htryrecv as [_ [_ [Hcomplete _]]]. apply Hcomplete. + destruct Htryrecv as [_ [_ [_ Hdom]]]. apply Hdom. + intros l.
